flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Escupe Polvo Veneno para envenenar al enemigo y,nluego, lo liquida con Ácido.
Sputa Velenpolvere per immobilizzare il nemico e poinlo finisce con il suo Acido.
It spits outnPOISONPOWDER tonimmobilize thefenemy and thennfinishes it withna spray of ACID.
It spits outnPOISONPOWDER tonimmobilize thefenemy and thennfinishes it withna spray of ACID.
When hungry, itnswallows anythingnthat moves. Itsfhapless prey isnmelted inside bynstrong acids.
Even though it isnfilled with ACID,nit does not meltfbecause it alsonoozes a neutral­nizing fluid.
If its prey isnbigger than itsnmouth, it slicesfup the victim withnsharp leaves, thenneats every morsel.
When it's hungry,nit swings itsnrazor-sharpfleaves, slicing upnany unlucky objectnnearby for food.
WEEPINBELL has a large hook on its rearnend. At night, the POKéMON hooks on tona tree branch and goes to sleep.fIf it moves around in its sleep, it maynwake up to find itself on the ground.
WEEPINBELL has a large hook on its rearnend. At night, the POKéMON hooks on tona tree branch and goes to sleep.fIf it moves around in its sleep, it maynwake up to find itself on the ground.
At night, a WEEPINBELL hangs on to a treenbranch with its hooked rear and sleeps.nIf it moves around in its sleep, it maynwake up to find itself on the ground.
The leafy parts act as cutters fornslashing foes. It spits a fluid thatndissolves everything.
It spits out POISONPOWDER to immobilizenthe enemy and then finishes it with anspray of ACID.
A Pokémon that appears to be anplant. It captures unwary prey byndousing them with a toxic powder.
A Pokémon that appears to be anplant. It captures unwary prey byndousing them with a toxic powder.
A Pokémon that appears to be anplant. It captures unwary prey byndousing them with a toxic powder.
Even though it is filled with acid,nit does not melt because it alsonoozes a protective fluid.
If its prey is bigger than itsnmouth, it slices up the victim withnsharp leaves, then eats every morsel.
Un Pokémon végétal. Il capture lesnproies étourdies en les endormantnà l’aide d’une poudre toxique.
A Pokémon that appears to be anplant. It captures unwary prey byndousing them with a toxic powder.
Un Pokémon végétal. Il capture lesnproies étourdies en les endormantnà l’aide d’une poudre toxique.
A Pokémon that appears to be anplant. It captures unwary prey byndousing them with a toxic powder.
A Pokémon that appears to be anplant. It captures unwary prey byndousing them with a toxic powder.
A Pokémon that appears to be anplant. It captures unwary prey byndousing them with a toxic powder.
はっぱの　ぶぶんは　カッターになってnあいてを　きりさく。くちからはnなんでも　とかす　えきたいを　はく。
잎사귀 부분은 칼날이 되어n상대를 베어버린다. 입에서는n무엇이든 녹이는 액체를 뿜어낸다.
Ses membres en forme de feuilles permettent ànBoustiflor de trancher ses adversaires. Il crache unnfluide capable de tout dissoudre.
Die Blätter werden eingesetzt, um Gegnernaufzuschlitzen. Dieses Pokémon spuckt einenFlüssigkeit, die alles auflöst.
Las hojas que tiene actúan como cuchillas enncombate. Otra de sus armas es el corrosivo fluidonque expulsa.
Si serve delle foglie laterali come lame contro innemici. Il fluido che secerne dalla bocca scioglienqualsiasi cosa.
The leafy parts act as cutters for slashing foes.nIt spits a fluid that dissolves everything.
葉っぱの　部分は　カッターになってn相手を　切り裂く。口からはnなんでも　溶かす　液体を　吐く。
まず　どくのこなを　はき　あいてのnうごきを　とめて　しまってからnようかいえきで　とどめを　さす。
우선 독가루를 뿌려 상대의n움직임을 멈추게 하고 나서n용해액으로 숨통을 끊는다.
Il crache de la Poudre Toxik pour immobiliser sa proienet il l’achève avec de l’Acide.
Dieses Pokémon lähmt den Gegner mit Giftpuder,nbevor es ihn mit Säure erledigt.
It spits out Poison Powder to immobilize the enemynand then finishes it with a spray of Acid.
まず　毒の粉を　吐き　相手のn動きを　止めてしまってからn溶解液で　とどめを　刺す。
よるに　なると　おしりの　フックを　きの　えだにnひっかけて　ぶらさがり　ねむりに　つく。nねぞうが　わるいと　あさ　おっこちているよ。
밤이 되면 엉덩이의 갈고리를 나뭇가지에n걸고 매달려서 잠든다.n잠버릇이 나쁘면 아침에 떨어져 있다.
Boustiflor est doté d’un gros crochet. La nuit, ce Pokémonns’accroche à une branche pour s’endormir. Quand il anun sommeil agité, il se réveille par terre.

Ultrigaria hat einen großen Haken an seinem Hinterteil.nNachts hängt sich dieses Pokémon zum Schlafen an einennAst. Wenn es sich im Schlaf bewegt, kann es passieren,ndass es auf dem Boden wieder aufwacht.
Weepinbell tiene un gancho a modo de extremidad superiorntrasera, que usa por la noche para colgarse de una rama ynecharse a dormir. Si se mueve mientras duerme, puede acabarnen el suelo.
Weepinbell è dotato di un grande uncino posteriore.nDi notte lo usa per appendersi a un ramo e mettersi andormire. Talvolta, agitandosi nel sonno, si sveglia al suolo.
Weepinbell has a large hook on its rear end. At night, thenPokémon hooks on to a tree branch and goes to sleep.nIf it moves around in its sleep, it may wake up to find itselfnon the ground.
夜に　なると　お尻の　フックを　木の　枝にn引っ掛けて　ぶら下がり　眠りに　つく。n寝相が　悪いと　朝　落っこちているよ。
よるに　なると　おしりの　フックを　きの　えだにnひっかけて　ぶらさがり　ねむりに　つく。nねぞうが　わるいと　あさ　おっこちているよ。
밤이 되면 엉덩이의 갈고리를 나뭇가지에n걸고 매달려서 잠든다.n잠버릇이 나쁘면 아침에 떨어져 있다.

Weepinbell has a large hook on its rear end. At night, thenPokémon hooks on to a tree branch and goes to sleep.nIf it moves around in its sleep, it may wake up to find itselfnon the ground.
夜に　なると　お尻の　フックを　木の　枝にn引っ掛けて　ぶら下がり　眠りに　つく。n寝相が　悪いと　朝　落っこちているよ。
おなかが　へると　てあたりしだいにnうごくものを　のみこんではnようかいえきで　とどめを　さす。
배가 고프면 움직이는 것을n닥치는 대로 삼킨 다음n용해액으로 마무리한다.
肚子餓的時候會把周圍n會動的東西全都吞下去，n然後用溶解液致其於死地。
Quand il a faim, il avale tout ce qui bouge,npuis achève ses proies avec de l’acide.
Wenn es hungrig ist, schnappt es willkürlich nachnallem, was sich bewegt. Nachdem es seine Beutenverschluckt hat, schaltet es sie mit Säure aus.
Cuando tiene hambre, engulle a todo lo quense mueve. La pobre presa acaba disuelta ennsus ácidos.
Quando è affamato divora qualsiasi cosangli capiti a tiro e la scioglie con i suoinpotenti acidi.
When hungry, it swallows anything that moves.nIts hapless prey is dissolved by strong acids.
お腹が　減ると　手あたり次第にn動くものを　飲みこんではn溶解液で　とどめを　さす。
它在肚子饿的时候会n吞掉周围会动的东西，n分泌溶解液让其致命。
